select Page

Posted by Varun Gupta  May    News  

Andrew Young
 Courtesy of Emory Photo

At Emory Universitys one hundred and seventy-fourth commencement on Monday more than  students and family members watched former U.S PERIOD Ambassador to the United Nations and former Atlanta Mayor Andrew Young deliver a keynote address in which he discussed fulfilling spiritual purpose in life PERIOD

A  graduate from Howard University D.C. Young said that his spiritual purpose was not always evident to him PERIOD With a hint of humor he remarked that indecision crept into his mind as he navigated the world of public advocacy PERIOD

The only thing I could think of was that I got this paper but I dont know nothing Young said PERIOD Graduation left me with a huge question mark. as laughter replaced the silence from before Young launched into a story from his childhood PERIOD Young said that his family once stopped in North Carolina on a roadtrip from Washington D.C. to New Orleans PERIOD Frustrated by his parents decision to attend a church conference he chose to go on a run and said he was eventually subdued by a realization that he said felt greater than himself PERIOD

Whoever made heaven and earth wherever all of this beauty and creativity has come from we could not have left me out Young said PERIOD There is something there for me too. young also recalled that his greatest breakthroughs such as drafting the Civil Rights Act of  and Voting Rights Act of  came at a moment of perplexion PERIOD

We really didnt know what we were doing Young said PERIOD We had no idea how this country could change so much. keith Davis father of graduate Rhyan Davis 19C praised Youngs understanding of the spiritual self and how it connects to higher education PERIOD

I think it was a fantastic speech PERIOD  I liked the analogy on being connected spiritually Davis said PERIOD You have to treat each other with kindness and support each other as we are interdependent on others. tiffany Ning sister of Courtney Ning 19C and Swazilandnative said she appreciated Youngs relatability PERIOD

It was quite nice to feel that Young was feeling exactly the same way as I did following graduation Ning said PERIOD I also liked how he touched on history and provided a cultural outlook being that my family is not from here. throughout the duration of the ceremony the outside temperature hovered around  degrees Fahrenheit with the sun emerging at  a.m PERIOD

I thought it would be scorching PERIOD We were anticipating that PERIOD  You have no idea we packed water bottles and tangerines Ning said PERIOD

The diverse class of graduates ranged from  to  years of age and hailed from  states and  countries around the world PERIOD Among the Colleges graduates  percent had a cumulative GPA of . or higher PERIOD

Varun Gupta 20C is studying political science and philosophy PERIOD He seeks discomfort by shadowing people in different professions such as campus security a sous chef and bar manager PERIOD Apart from the Wheel you can catch him playing ultimate frisbee or recounting a crazy travel experience from one of  different countries that he has visited PERIOD
